title: Indiya Naade Lyrics Moondraam Ulaga Por
stanzas:
indiya naade nee verum
neerum nilama
engal uyirin swaasam

en kangal thoongadhu
en nenjam thaangadhu
en desam maanam
thalai saaindhaal

man vaasam maaradhu
nam veeram thoorkaadhu
eppothum engal
vetri naal thaan

indiya naade nee
verum neerum nilama
engal uyirin swaasam

oru thuli uthiram
irukira varaikkum
ennuyir desathai kaakum

en desam pole
inge yethu veru ethu
enai pettra naade
unai nenjil vaithu vaazhvome

thaai naattai pole
inge yethu veru ethu
uyirum kadavulum neeye

aduthavan mannai thoda mattom
asaiyil ethiriyai vida
mattome ellaiyil
en desa kodi endrum
thaalvillai

pala mozhi inam
irunthalum desathil
onrena ingu
vaazhvome desathil
orupothum nammakulle
pirivillai

pala kodi makkal
vaazhum desam
ottrumaye engal
vettri swaasam

indiya naade nee verum
neerum nilama
engal uyirin swaasam

seo.title: Indiya Naade Lyrics Moondraam Ulaga Por
seo.description: Get the complete Indiya Naade Lyrics Moondraam Ulaga Por from Moondraam Ulaga Por. Read the lyrics penned by Annamalai and composed by Ved Shankar and sung by Shankar Mahadevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Annamalai, Moondraam Ulaga Por, Ved Shankar, Shankar Mahadevan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
